    • getSpotifyApi

      public static SpotifyApi getSpotifyApi()
      Returns the Spotify API singleton. If the singleton is null, or its authorisation has expired, a new API singleton will be created and returned.

      This singleton should not be cached, as its authorisation may expire between API requests.
      Returns:
      The Spotify API, which may be null

    • getYoutubeApi

      public static YouTube getYoutubeApi()
      Returns the YouTube API singleton. If the singleton is null, a new API singleton will be created and returned.
      Returns:
      The YouTube API, which may be null
